question: Which of the following is the unit of rate of chemical reaction?
explanation: If concentration is in mol L<sup>-1</sup> and time is in seconds then the units will be Mol L<sup>-1</sup> s<sup>-1</sup>. However, in gaseous reactions, when the concentration of gases is expressed in terms of their partial pressures, then the units of the rate equation will be atm s<sup>â€“1</sup>.
